Key Match Events: India made six changes from the last game with Sanju Samson, Jasprit Bumrah, Bhuvneshwar Kumar, Yuzvendra Chahal, Ravindra Jadeja coming in, and Deepak Hooda making his T20I debut.
Pre-Game Insights: Ruturaj Gaikwad was initially supposed to play but he has got some wrist issue.
Ruturaj Gaikwad complained of pain in his right wrist, which is affecting his batting.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Wrist injury kept Ruturaj Gaikwad out of first T20I against SL | BCCI
The BCCI Medical Team is examining him.
